events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the shipment is still not delivered. The tracking information hasn't updated in days, and I am very concerned about the delay.
The system identified keywords related to shipping and delay, categorizing this case under Delivery Delay.
An agent has been assigned to address the customer's concern about late delivery.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with the delay in your order delivery.
Could you please provide the order number so I can check the shipping status and provide more details?
Sure, the order number is 8745321. I checked the tracking link but it hasn’t been updated since it was shipped last week.
I verified your order status and contacted the courier. They expect the package to arrive within the next two days. We will notify you if there is any further delay.
Thank you for the update. I appreciate you looking into this and will wait to see if the package arrives soon.
We see that your order has been delivered successfully today. Please confirm receipt and let us know if everything is satisfactory.
Just following up to ensure you received your order and everything is in good condition. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
Since your package was delivered and no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
